programme.desc: Welcome to Kite Masters, the series that flies you around the world, together with some of the very best athletes from one of the most exciting, fast, extreme, and stylish sports: Kiteboarding. We kick off this season at one of the most renowned venues for kiteboarding action: Torregrande, located in the beautiful island of Sardinia, Italy. The Formula Kite Youth European Championship drew young and enthusiastic athletes, eager to showcase their skills and compete at the highest level. Meanwhile, the KiteFoil Open Masters World Championship provided a platform for experienced individuals over the age of 35 to demonstrate their expertise and compete among their peers.

programme.title: The First Second - Samantha Davies
programme.desc: Samantha Davies sees the ocean as a pleasure, obvious. In symbiosis with her boat, she leads a violent struggle with the harsh conditions and "loves it" in an almost inexplicable way! She knows and enjoys her luck, which she shares with Initiatives Cœur. She also measures it to that of her grandfather, a war submariner…. At the start of a race like the Vendée Globe, it is an adventurer who sets off.

programme.title: GWA Wingfoil World Tour Cabo Verde 2023
programme.desc: The GWA Wingfoil World Tour is excited to hit Cape Verde for the first World Cup of the pure Wave discipline. The best wingfoil wave athletes are united at one of the most renowned and best wave locations in the world to showcase the highest level of wingfoil wave performance in this surfing-only event.

programme.title: The First Second - Armel Le Cléac'h E
programme.desc: Armel Le Cléach creates his victories thanks to a strong relationship with the whole team of which he is the extension ... But for this navigator engaged in a daunting battle with the ocean on a giant 32-meter trimaran, each course towards a new start is a new battle with the unknown, with his own will and with his primary adversary: himself.

programme.title: Kite Masters 2022 - Episode 5
programme.desc: In this episode, Kite Masters takes you to Sardinia, Italy for the highly-anticipated 2022 Formula Kite World Championship! Poetto beach in Cagliari was the perfect host for the class’s pinnacle event, welcoming the world’s best riders for the biggest kiteboarding event! 150 ambitious riders representing 44 nations from every continent travelled to breathtaking Cagliari for the biggest test of the year before they continue their journey at the 2024 Olympic Games.

programme.title: GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2023 - Rio
programme.desc: The GWA Wingfoil World Tour hits Rio De Janeiro for a pure Wave event in 2023! Here the Wave discipline is held. The focus of this ground-breaking discipline will be riding waves, using the power of the swell to surf with commitment and flow. Scores will also be given for aerial tricks, but those must be executed without the power of the wing. It promises to be an engrossing competition and a spectacular addition to the fast-evolving world tour. The Top-ranked riders from wingfoil Surf-Freestyle are eager to put their wave-riding skills against their rivals.

programme.title: GKA Freestyle-Kite World Cup Colombia 2023
programme.desc: Salinas del Rey, Colombia, is a great location added to the GKA Kite World Tour in 2022. This spot is heralded as one of the best wave riding and flat water spots on the Colombian Caribbean coast. Therefore this kitesurfing paradise hosts the second stop of the 2023 World Tour season! Here Freestyle and Big Air tricks make this the perfect destination for a spectacular freestyle event

programme.title: GKA Kite-Surf World Cup Cape Verde 2024 (Eng)
programme.desc: The Qatar Airways GKA Kite World Tour is excited to return to the Cape Verdean island of Sal to kick off the 2024 season with the Kite-Surf discipline. Cape Verde is one of the best wave locations in the world and has been hosting numerous historical events over a number of years.

programme.title: Engadinwind 2023
programme.desc: The Vanora ENGADINWIND by Dakine 2023 gathers the world class of Windsurfer and Wingfoiler competing at the Lake Silvaplana in the Engadine, Switzerland. The event has developed into the worlds most important and largest foil event. Furthermore, it is the place to be for the U21 World Championships in the iQ FOiL windsurfing category, that will be part of the Olympic programme in Paris 2024. Also, 65 windsurfers, kite-surfers and wingfoilers will honor tradition and take part in the 46th edition of the Engadin Surf & Kite marathon on Lake Silvaplana.

programme.title: GKA Freestyle-Kite World Cup 2022 Final
programme.desc: The final round of the Freestyle discipline on the Qatar Airways GKA Kite World Tour starts Tuesday 8th November. The Copa Kitley Qatar Airways GKA Freestyle-Kite World Cup Taiba will see the world’s best freestyle kiters compete in perfect conditions on the infamous lagoon. Such idyllic conditions should bring out the absolute best in all competitors as they battle it out to decide their final end of season rankings for 2022, with one male and one female rider becoming the Qatar Airways GKA Freestyle-Kite World Champions!

programme.title: European Freestyle Pro Tour Austria 2022
programme.desc: The legendary freestyle windsurfing event on lake Neusiedl is back! Since 1998 the best Freestyle Windsurfers in the world travel down to the Austrian water sports capital to compete in the European Freestyle Pro Tour. This edition, taking place between the 27th of April and the 1st of May, is historical in that for the first time ever Women are competing at the EFPT Surf Opening as well!

programme.title: Running the Loowit Trail on Mt St Helens
programme.desc: The Loowit Trail circumnavigates Mount St. Helens, past old-growth forests, waterfalls, meadows, and the leftovers of the volcanos 1980 eruption. We ran the roughly 30 mile trail, starting from Climbers Bivouac Campground. (English version with French and Italian subtitles)

programme.title: Highest Peak on Vancouver's North Shore - BRUNSWICK MOUNTAIN (Eng)
programme.desc: We summit Brunswick Mountain, the highest peak on Vancouvers North Shore, followed by Mt. Harvey right next to it. This video was filmed on the traditional, ancestral and unceded territory of the Coast Salish Peoples - Sḵwx̱wú7mesh (Squamish), Tsleil-Waututh & Musqueam First Nations.

programme.title: Engadinsnow 2024
programme.desc: ENGADINSNOW by Dakine is a worldwide unique sports and freeride event, combining innovation and freeriding! It is an outstanding and unique worldwide sports contest and unique regarding the gorgeous Swiss landscape. This parallel freeride event in Silvaplana combines over 20 years of innovation and freeriding. One freeride skier and one snowboarder make up a team in front of a backdrop with the fascinating mountains of the Canton of Grisons.

programme.title: Open Faces Obertauern 2024
programme.desc: The 4*Freeride World Tour Challenger provides the big stage for the final decisions for qualification for the Freeride World Tour 2025. This international freeride contest is taking place in Obertauern for the first time and offers ideal conditions for this event with numerous freeride options.

programme.title: Nightmare Climbs - Stentaria (Eng)
programme.desc: Our two heroes Emiliano Cantagallo and Patrick Martini go through the door of hell climbing 1011 meters on La Stentaria with an average gradient of 19 which gets worse until reaching the maximum of 32 before finally climbing the hill. We are in Friuli - on the opposite side of the Zoncolan up the pass of the saddle. Seeing is believing......

programme.title: A Feather in the West
programme.desc: In September 2019, a team of talented Irish climbers [Chloe Condron, Kevin Kilroy, Michelle OLoughlin and Conor McGovern] travelled to the small island of Owey to explore sea cliffs that local guidebook writer Iain Miller claims, have “enough new routing potential to last at least twelve lifetimes”. ‘A Feather in the West’ is a film about their trad climbing experiences and the relatively niche pursuit of first ascents, set on the Wild Atlantic Way, off the west coast of County Donegal. (Special thanks to Pertex)

programme.title: Engadin Ski Marathon 2024
programme.desc: The Engadin Skimarathon is the second largest cross-country skiing event in the world and the largest cross-country skiing event in Switzerland. Among the large crowd of participants are also world-class runners. Every year, Switzerlands largest sports event attracts more than 11000 cross-country fans from over 67 nations to the Upper Engadin valley.

programme.title: Dobbiaco - Cortina Cross Country Race 2022
programme.desc: The beautiful story of the Granfondo Dobbiaco-Cortina began on April 3, 1977, after a heavy snowfall, when a group of friends with a passion for Nordic skiing decided to organize a small race. The fascination of this much loved Nordic ski race derives not only from its evocative Dolomite setting but also from the fact that it unites two Italian mountain territories, two renowned tourist destinations in the heart of the Dolomites, a UNESCO World Natural Heritage Site, two languages, two cultures, two valleys with a shared passion for skiing. And this is the story of its first 45 years of life, a journey connecting the past with the present, featuring breathtaking landscapes and sporting feats. The Dobbiaco Cortina is a race not to be missed, a race that every cross-country skier must do at some point in their career.La lunga storia della Granfondo Dobbiaco Cortina nacque il 3 aprile 1977 dopo una abbondante nevicata, quando un gruppo di amici con la passione per lo sci nordico decisero di organizzare una piccola gara.Una gara di sci nordico che unisce due territori di montagna italiani, due rinomate stazioni turistiche nel cuore delle Dolomiti patrimonio dellUNESCO, due lingue, due culture, due valli con la stessa passione per lo sci. E questa è la storia dei sui 45 anni di vita, un viaggio tra storia e presente, tra panorami mozzafiato e gesta sportive. La Dobbiaco Cortina è una gara da non perdere, che ogni fondista dovrebbe fare nella propria carriera.

programme.title: Lekkarod 2022 (V. Int)
programme.desc: It is an exceptional line-up of mushers that has an appointment for this seventh edition of the Lekkarod. Coming from France, Germany, Switzerland, Spain and Alaska, 30 teams and 13 participants in the ski-joëring category took part in a total of 9 stages. From Chamrousse(Isère) to Bessans (Savoie) via Val DArly, the Lekkarod is an event counting for the IFSS World Cup (International Federation of Sleddog Sports).

programme.title: The First Second - Sam Anthamatten
programme.desc: A specialist in high mountains, Sam is a committed freerider, but behind his instinct to ski, there is a guide: it is his job, his culture. At each line, an internal struggle begins between security and risk-taking ... The balance is difficult, with great freedom involved. Through his practice, he lives and perpetuates a mythical image, that of the Zermatt guide.

programme.title: La Grande Odyssée 2023 - Best of
programme.desc: The Grande Odyssée VVF, carrying the fundamental values ​​of those who love the mountains, has been since its first edition in January 2005, an essential event for dog sledding in Europe. For the first time in 19 years, the Grande Odyssée VVF will cover, in addition to Savoie and Haute Savoie, the department of Isère. The 19th edition will be held from January 7 to 19, 2023, with the presence of 66 mushers and their 600 top-level athletic dogs from all over Europe. They will set off for 13 days of racing, 400 km, 12,000 m of elevation gain, 11 stages, and will cross around 20 ski resorts.

programme.title: World Rookie Freeski Finals 2024
programme.desc: The World Rookie Tour is excited that the Freeski Finals are held in the magnificent Ursus Snowpark at Madonna di Campiglio. This event shows the world’s most talented young freeski athletes as they compete in one of the most celebrated snowparks in Europe.This exclusive opportunity brings the excitement and competitive spirit of one of the most anticipated events in youth action sports directly to athletes, fans and viewers. Fans from across the globe have the opportunity to witness the future of freeskiing unfold in real-time.

programme.title: Norvan Falls
programme.desc: A group of us pay a visit to one of our favourite local waterfalls, Norvan Falls in North Vancouver, BC. Youll also get a look at how the falls look when frozen mid-winter.

programme.title: Nightmare Climbs - Jafferau (Eng)
programme.desc: Patrick Martini and his special guests are ready to climb a new, very tough peak: it is the ascent of Jafferau, in Bardonecchia, where Chris Froome won a legendary Pink Jersey in 2018.

programme.title: Freeski World Rookie Fest Innsbruck 2024
programme.desc: Once again Nordkette Skyline Park hosts the next generation of Freeski to showcase the future of the sport. Riders hit the Slopestyle course above Innsbruck to determine who will get tickets for this year’s World Rookie Freeski Finals later on this season.

programme.title: Petzl Roc Trip Argentina
programme.desc: Located in the heart of the Patagonian pampas, in Argentinas Chubut province, Piedra Paradas monolith rises up from the surrounding desert. Lying just to the north, the majestic La Buitrera Canyon was home to the Petzl RocTrip. For more than a week, climbers from all over the world came together to share a common passion: climbing. Thanks to the hard work of a team of Argentinean and international route developers, La Buitrera Canyon, 5 km long with towering cliffs up to 200m high, is now one of Argentinas major climbing spots. For the tenth edition of the Petzl RocTrip, more than 1500 people climbed in the wind, dust, heat, and cold, for an unforgettable Patagonian experience!

programme.title: World Rookie Snowboard Finals 2023
programme.desc: The 2023 World Rookie Finals are took place in Zell am See-Kaprun (Austria), where the world’s best young snowboarders competed in order to take the titles of World Rookie and Grom Snowboard Champions.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2023 Ep4 Fieberbrunn, Austria
programme.desc: The Freeride World Tour 2023 has its fourth stop in Fieberbrunn, Austria - as always with the best freeriders from all over the world! The first part of the FWT finals takes place in Fieberbrunn, where the athletes have to conquer the imposing Wildseeloder. This mountain is a real test of endurance even for the most experienced pros, and the athletes will certainly have to give it all.

programme.title: World Rookie Snowboard Finals 2024
programme.desc: The World Rookie Snowboard Finals are an iconic event in the world of youth snowboarding, where emerging athletes have the chance to test themselves and compete against the best in their category becoming a star! The Finals are back in style at the historic location of Kitzsteinhorn Zell am See-Kaprun, for a six-day contest and non-stop activities, providing an exceptional setting and unparalleled snow conditions for this high-level competition. This prestigious event determines the new 2024 World Rookie Champions title for Snowboard Halfpipe and Slopestyle, who earn the opportunity to participate in renowned international competitions and training camps in 2024.

programme.title: Nepal - The Other Side of Things
programme.desc: A unique spiritual voyage among the giant Himalayan mountains of Everest and Annapurna along ancient paths and across rivers, capturing the local beliefs to discover the marvels of an ancient mountain people in order to understand the meaning of self.

programme.title: Margalef - Climbing
programme.desc: Margalef is a little village next to the Monsant river, in Catalunya. The most amazing rocks in Europe and hundreds routes for climbing. Pure fun and climbing in this little entertaining film.

programme.title: FWT Junior World Championship 2024
programme.desc: The FWT Junior World Championship (FWT JWC) is the highlight of the freeride juniors on ski and snowboard. On January 20th to 26th 2023, the annual highlight of the season takes place in Kappl-Paznaun, Austria. In challenging runs, the junior athletes show spectacular jumps and drops in the terrain as well as challenging lines through the deep snow.

programme.title: Backcountry skiing at Mcgillivray Lodge (Eng)
programme.desc: In March of 2021, Jeff and a group of friends took a helicopter from Pemberton, which is about 2 hours north of Vancouver, to an area called Whitecap Alpine to stay in the backcountry at McGillivray Pass Lodge for 4 nights and experience 4 great days of backcountry skiing.

programme.title: Engadin Ski Marathon 2023
programme.desc: On Sunday, March 12, 2023, more than 14,000 athletes competed in the 53rd edition of the Engadin Skimarathon, the second largest cross-country skiing event in the world and the largest cross-country skiing event in Switzerland. Among the large crowd of participants are also world-class runners. What awaits them on this day in the high valley are 42 strenuous kilometers over frozen lakes, past typical Engadine villages and through a picturesque Swiss Alpine landscape. The best completed the course in a time of around 1.5 hours.

programme.title: The Outdoor Sports Show 2023 - Episode 6
programme.desc: Lets start this episode with the world of XTERRA, where the Musandam Peninsula in Oman provided the ideal setting for the Middle Easts inaugural XTERRA event. Next, we attend the Shanghai Half Marathon.Then, lets shift our focus to a unique mountain bike adventure—the renowned La Leyenda del Caribe in the Dominican Republic.The beautiful Balearic Island of Menorca hosted the second successful edition of Jans Gravel Menorca: a unique cycling adventure through the roads of the Biosphere Reserve Island. Let’s then take a dive, as we are getting closer to the launch of a brand new project. UltraSwim 33.3 testing swimmers in a distance of 33.3km, spread over four days and six swims. Our aquatic exploration continues with the 2023 CMAS World Freediving Indoor Championship held in Kuwait.

programme.title: Golden Trail Series - Chasing Dreams Season 2022 - Episode 1 Keep Dreaming (Eng)
programme.desc: A new season starts, teams from all around the globe are joining the circuit. For the first time in the Golden Trail Series, runners from Kenya will take on the mountains with hopes of being as fast as they are on the roads. The legendary Zegama is finally back as the opening race of the season, the show is guaranteed.

programme.title: Ungrounded Episode 3 - Meredith Edwards
programme.desc: Meredith Edwards is an elite-level mountain ultra runner, with podium finishes at the Ultra-Trail du Mont-Blanc TDS race, the Javelina Jundred 100K and the Flagstaff Skyrace 55K. She is also a member of the U.S. Ski Mountaineering Team. In Episode 3, she reveals how in 2019 she fought an inner struggle with her body that almost resulted in a full blood transfusion-and came back from it to win one of the world’s most challenging Ultra Marathons. (English version with French, German, Italian and Spanish subtitles available)

programme.title: Marathon Des Sables 2023 #0
programme.desc: Marathon Des Sables 2023 Day 0. On the MARATHON DES SABLES, Saturday is traditionally dedicated to the material and medical controls, an obligatory passage before attempting the ultimate desert adventure for the 1150 participants of the 37th edition. Marathon Des Sables 2023 Jour 0. Sur le MARATHON DES SABLES, le samedi est traditionnellement consacré aux contrôles matériel et médical, un passage obligé avant de tenter l’aventure désertique ultime pour les quelques 1150 participants de la 37e édition.

programme.title: Golden Trail World Series 2023 - USA (Eng)
programme.desc: For the two last stages before the final, the GTWS visits the USA! Follow the best trail running athletes on the US trails. Enter their life during this road trip through the western part of the USA and watch them competing on the two last races of the season - Pikes Peak Ascent and Mammoth Lakes 26K. Who will get qualified for the Grand Final in Italy? Lets see!

programme.title: Racing Georgia - Ep 1 (Eng)
programme.desc: In June of 2022, Jeff travelled to the country of Georgia to compete in a 7-day stage race with Racing the Planet. Hed run 250 km while carrying all of his food and supplies for the week on his backs, and this 7-part series will document his entire adventure, starting with the week he spent travelling around the country and taking in its rich history.

programme.title: Epic Azores (Eng)
programme.desc: The Azores Islands are a Portuguese archipelago in the middle of the Atlantic ocean. Jeff visited in December of 2022 to run the 60k EPIC Azores trail race on Sao Miguel Island where hed end up having to battle some pretty tough conditions. He then stayed for two weeks to soak in as much as he could of all the Islands have to offer, including its rugged coastlines, green pastures, lake-filled calderas, and local cuisine.

programme.title: The Outdoor Sports Show 2023 - Episode 7
programme.desc: This episode begins with the Algarve Bike Challenge, Portugals most popular MTB stage race. Shifting our focus to Austria, we delve into the thrilling action of the Alpentour Trophy 2023, a multi-day mountain biking race. From Austria, we venture towards the vibrant capital of Spain, Madrid for a quick preview of the second edition of the Madrid 7 Picos cycling race which will take place in September, in the picturesque Sierra de Madrid. Continuing our mountainous exploration, we transition to the prestigious Golden Trail Series for the 2023 Zegama Aizkorri race.

programme.title: Inside my borders - Sicily (Eng)
programme.desc: Michele, our backpacker friend, is forced to travel inside his Italian borders due to the travel restrictions following the Covid crisis. This time no biking but a long walk across Sicily on the Magna Via Francigena from Palermo to Agrigento, an ancient road already used by the Romans as early as in the 2nd century BC. This is a 187 km walk divided into 9 stages. All along the way, Michele enjoys gorgeous natural scenery, lots of hills and climbs, prehistoric sites, beautiful villages such as the famous Corleone, Prizzi, Sutera and several others. He will also have the pleasure to taste the famous Cannoli and several other gastronomic Sicilian specialties.

programme.title: Golden Trail Series - Chasing Dreams Season 2022 - Episode 7 Strategic Decision (Eng)
programme.desc: The rankings are very tight during this 5-day stage race in Madeira, the top spots are almost secured, but to get a spot inside the top ten is the real challenge. Decision- making will be key throughout this final. This year’s rookie, Sophia Laukli, will have to make tough decisions to defend her position at the end of this season.

programme.title: Golden Trail Series - Chasing Dreams 2023 - Ep 1 Redemption (Eng)
programme.desc: The season kicks off in the Basque Country with Rémi Bonnet aiming to maintain his champion status and Manuel Merillas chasing his seven-year dream, bringing back last season’s rivalry to Zegama’s challenging trails.

programme.title: The First Second - Gediminas Grinius
programme.desc: Running with Gediminas means exploring the mental techniques hes continuously developing to both cope with pain and get on the podiums of the worlds most difficult ultra-trails. Or how a Lithuanian veteran of the Iraq War turned weakness and trauma into personal progress by running with his mind!

programme.title: Maxi Race 2023
programme.desc: Le tOur du lac, (la MaXi Race 88 km / 5000 m D+), course reine du week-end, a livré un scénario haletant avec une course indécise jusqu’au bout. Au départ, à 2 h 50 du matin, ils étaient 1752 coureurs dont 158 femmes.

programme.title: Ungrounded Episode 1 - Caroline Gleich
programme.desc: Caroline Gleich, a world class ski mountaineer, summited Mt. Everest last spring as part of her #ClimbForEquality campaign to raise awareness for gender equality. In Episode 1, Gleich overcomes her own struggle after tearing her ACL to rise to the top for all women. (English version with French, Italian, German and Spanish subtitles available)

programme.title: The Outdoor Sports Show 2023 - Episode 7
programme.desc: This episode begins with the Algarve Bike Challenge, Portugals most popular MTB stage race. Shifting our focus to Austria, we delve into the thrilling action of the Alpentour Trophy 2023, a multi-day mountain biking race. From Austria, we venture towards the vibrant capital of Spain, Madrid for a quick preview of the second edition of the Madrid 7 Picos cycling race which will take place in September, in the picturesque Sierra de Madrid. Continuing our mountainous exploration, we transition to the prestigious Golden Trail Series for the 2023 Zegama Aizkorri race.

programme.title: Sunshine Coast Trail - Fastpacking 115 km in 3 Days
programme.desc: The Sunshine Coast Trail is Canada’s longest hut-to-hut hiking trail, just 5 hours North of Vancouver, BC. It’s a unique and beautiful backcountry experience that stretches 180km from Sarah Point to Saltery Bay, along coastal shorelines, through old growth forests, and up to panoramic mountaintops. Early June of 2019, my friend Adam and I planned on fastpacking a large portion of the trail, starting from Powell River and running 115 km back to Saltery Bay. Our primary goal was to train and test out our ultralight gear for our upcoming 5-day fastpacking adventure on the Tahoe Rim Trail a few weeks later.

programme.title: Ultra Vegans
programme.desc: For endurance athletes, getting the right diet can make the difference between success and failure. Many are now choosing to adopt a plant based regime and they are witnessing some remarkable results in terms of performance and recovery. Athletes, fitness coaches, sports nutritionists, ultra runners are sharing with us their experience and conviction wether they are motivated by self performance or animal wellfare.

programme.title: Marathon Des Sables 2023 #1
programme.desc: Marathon Des Sables 2023 Day 1. A powerful storm swept the course and the bivouac of the 37th MARATHON DES SABLES, thus greatly complicating the task at hand for the 1,085 participants who had taken the start of the event. Mid-afternoon, the sky became darker and wind gusts carried away tons of sand with a few raindrops and thunder roars.Marathon Des Sables 2023 Jour 1. Une grosse tempête a balayé le parcours et le bivouac du 37e MARATHON DES SABLES, compliquant fortement la tâche des 1085 concurrents au départ. C’est en milieu d’après-midi que l’horizon s’est obscurci et que les bourrasques de vent ont emporté avec elles des tonnes de sable accompagnées de quelques gouttes de pluie et de grondements de tonnerre.

programme.title: Adventure Racing World Series 2022 - Panama
programme.desc: Twenty two teams, with racers from 17 nations, lined up on the start line near the town of Volcan in Panama, including the ARWS world #1 team ‘Torpedo Vidaraid’ (Spain), and 4 other top 10 teams from Poland, Ecuador, Brazil and Estonia. An expedition adventure race, in which international teams raced for 6 days, non-stop, over a 516km course, was the perfect way for them to show what Panama has to offer.

programme.title: Adventure Racing World Series 2022 - Panama
programme.desc: Twenty two teams, with racers from 17 nations, lined up on the start line near the town of Volcan in Panama, including the ARWS world #1 team ‘Torpedo Vidaraid’ (Spain), and 4 other top 10 teams from Poland, Ecuador, Brazil and Estonia. An expedition adventure race, in which international teams raced for 6 days, non-stop, over a 516km course, was the perfect way for them to show what Panama has to offer.

programme.title: Road To One Water Race Ep3 - Swimming
programme.desc: One Water Race is an endurance race based on Running, Swimming and Orienteering. 7 mixed teams of 7 athletes have to cross the Stockholm-Sweden archipelago from North to South in a non-stop 250 km race with 200 km of running and 50 km of swimming. They have to completely handle their navigation including in the darkness. Road to One Water Race Ep3 describes what is involved in swimming 50 km during the day and during the night in between Islands..

programme.title: Inside my borders - Sicily (Eng)
programme.desc: Michele, our backpacker friend, is forced to travel inside his Italian borders due to the travel restrictions following the Covid crisis. This time no biking but a long walk across Sicily on the Magna Via Francigena from Palermo to Agrigento, an ancient road already used by the Romans as early as in the 2nd century BC. This is a 187 km walk divided into 9 stages. All along the way, Michele enjoys gorgeous natural scenery, lots of hills and climbs, prehistoric sites, beautiful villages such as the famous Corleone, Prizzi, Sutera and several others. He will also have the pleasure to taste the famous Cannoli and several other gastronomic Sicilian specialties.

programme.title: Nepal - The Other Side of Things
programme.desc: A unique spiritual voyage among the giant Himalayan mountains of Everest and Annapurna along ancient paths and across rivers, capturing the local beliefs to discover the marvels of an ancient mountain people in order to understand the meaning of self.

programme.title: Rwanda Congo Uganda Bike Adventure - Part 2
programme.desc: Our friend, bikepacker and adventurer, Michele continues his epic 800km solo African bike packing adventure in Rwanda, through Congo and finishing in Uganda. Part 2 of 4 - in the heart of Rwanda : the Congo Nile Trail. Michele descends from the top of Nyungwe National Park at 2500 meters to the 1300m of Lake Kivu. He rides north on the 227 km Congo Nile Trail along the shore of Lake Kivu and then takes a boat to discover the wildlife on Monkey Island and photographs the immense bat population that inhabits Napoleon Island.

programme.title: Conquering The Vedder (Eng)
programme.desc: Conquer the Vedder is a multisport race (paddling, cycling, running) in Chilliwack, BC. We headed out for the inaugural event which featured a solo race on the Saturday and a relay on the Sunday.

programme.title: Road To One Water Race Ep2 - The Athletes
programme.desc: One Water Race is an endurance race based on Running, Swimming and Orienteering. 7 mixed teams of 7 athletes have to cross the Stockholm-Sweden archipelago from North to South in a non-stop 250 km race with 200 km of running and 50 km of swimming. They have to completely handle their navigation including in the darkness. Road to One Water Race Ep2 presents the athletes, their motivation and fears.

programme.title: The Outdoor Sports Show 2023 Episode 4
programme.desc: We start this episode in Slovakia for the 2023 Skimarathon European Championship, which coincided with the 50th edition of the renowned Biela Stopa Skimarathon race. We then move to Malaysia for the Northface Malaysia Mountain Trail Festival. We then cross the border from Malaysia to Thailand for another trail running event, the Amazean Jungle Thailand by UTMB! During our previous episode we were introduced to HYROX: the fitness race that is for everybody. It’s the ultimate test, a perfect combination between strength, endurance and determination. We finish with endurance swimming and the UltraSwim 33.3 which is the new global swimming series that will bring the experience to new levels.

programme.title: Tour de France Prudential Singapore Criterium
programme.desc: The Tour de France Prudential Singapore Criterium race weekend includes races for both professionals and amateurs. The two-day programme culminates with the criterium race featuring 28 top international riders (Marc Cavendish, Tadej Pogacar, Peter Sagan ...) from 7 of the worlds best professional cycling teams (UAE Emirates, Cofidis, Bahrain Victorious ...)

programme.title: Titan Desert Morocco 2023
programme.desc: From April 30th to May 5th, 503 brave mountain bikers from 25 countries all over the world tested their physical and mental endurance, covering over 600 kilometers and overcoming more than 6,000 meters of accumulated altitude in six stages, from Boumalne-Dadès to Maadid, crossing the desert and facing steep climbs, dangerous descents and inhospitable terrain.

programme.title: Cro Race 2023 Stage 5
programme.desc: Cro Race 2023 Stage 5 : CRIKVENICA-OZALJ

programme.title: Swiss Epic 2023
programme.desc: Teams of two compete in Switzerland’s pictures Graubünden region for the overall victory and important UCI mountain bike points at the Swiss Epic. With more than 350km and almost 12,000 meters of altitude, everything is demanded from the best mountain bikers. The route of the SPAR Swiss Epic 2023 leads over the breathtaking trails of Graubünden and crosses the Alps from Lenzerheide to St. Moritz before the event reaches its traditional conclusion in the town of Davos.

programme.title: Preparing to Give - The Film
programme.desc: Journalist & best-selling author, turned ultra-endurance cyclist, Rupert Guinness embarks on his final training camp (commonly known as "Hell Week") in preparation for the worlds toughest bike race: Race Across America (RAAM) 2022 with Crew Chief and friend Nathan Roderick Carter. The adventure starts with Revolve24; a 24-hour race in South Australia, before using the 24-hour event fatigue loading to hit the open roads of southern Australia, along the Great Ocean Road, and finishing with a twist at the peak of Falls Creek in the snowy region of Victoria, Australia.The story is an insight to the training camp showcasing determination, humanity, friendship, vulnerability, isolation on the road and the power of the pedal that is connecting people and connecting minds.

programme.title: Power of the pedal
programme.desc: Rupert Guiness embarks on a solo non-stop race across Australia from Darwin to Hobart cycling over 4900 KM in less than 2 weeks, through forest fires against the wind and during COVID under the same conditions as race across America - little sleep and minimum assistance. Helping connecting people and connecting minds.

programme.title: Tour of Hellas 2023 Stage 3
programme.desc: The penultimate day’s starting point will be the Navarino Dunes area in Costa Navarino, located in Messinia, in one of the most unspoiled landscapes in the Mediterranean, heading towards the bay of Navarino and will pass through historical places such as Pylos, Methoni and Koroni. Completing a counterclockwise semi-circle in the Prefecture of Messinia, the athletes will finish in the main square of Kyparissia (with the magnificent Upper Town and the castle of Arcadia), probably in a mass sprint.

programme.title: Freewheeling Ep.4 Giro d'Italia (Eng)
programme.desc: Exclusive live Inside the Giro DItalia with team Bahrain Victorious and guests presented by Ashley House- sprinter Jonathan Milan (winner of one stage), Damiano Caruso (5th place so far) and Jack Haig together with the sports Directors Franco Pellizotti and Gorazd Štangelj.

programme.title: Cro Race 2023 Stage 3
programme.desc: Cro Race 2023 Stage 3 : OTOČAC - OPATIJA

programme.title: L'Eroica 2022
programme.desc: LEroica draws its inspiration from classical cycling, from black and white images published on newspapers of the early 1900s to the times of the Bartali and Coppi duel, to more recent times when pedal cages and shifters on the down tube where still the main option on road racing bikes. LEroica chose as a convention 1987 as the year to draw the line between classic cycling and modern times. NOVA Eroica combines gravel, gran fondo and Eroica-style rest stops that encourage riders to Race, Ride and Relax! Open to gravel, road and cx bikes, NOVA celebrates the white roads of Tuscany by combining time trial segments with amazing transfer sections for the thrill of racing and an epic group ride experience.

programme.title: Freewheeling 2023 Ep.3 Tour of Flanders (Eng)
programme.desc: Exclusive behind the scenes of the classic - Tour of Flanders 2023 presented by Hannah Walker with an exclusive look at womens Ceratizit-WNT pro cycling team. Hannah discusses about the course, the strategy and the preparation for the race with the teams sport director Steffen Radochla, the genaral manager Claude Sun and with top cyclists Ariana and Martina Fidanza, Marta Lach, Milene De Zoete and others.

programme.title: From The South Up - The Film
programme.desc: Brendon Tyree, a photographer and ex elite bicycle racer from Sheffield in the UK is turning one of those old dreams into reality : to ride on his bike the length of South America. His trip starts off at the bottom of the world in Chile’s extreme south, and then ride north through a constantly changing landscape of Glaciers, Deserts and Salt flats followed by the high Andean Mountains and the Amazon Rain Forest before finally finishing up on the Caribbean coast of Colombia.

programme.title: The First Second - Jerome Clementz
programme.desc: Seeing Jérôme Clementzs eyes fixed on the track, we have already understood what dose of concentration, determination and pure strength he will unleash on the descent. Leaving, throughout his 20-year competitive career, little luck to his competitors, how does he oush the boundaries?

programme.title: Tour de France Saitama Criterium
programme.desc: The Tour de France Saitama Criterium Japan race weekend includes races for both professionals and amateurs. The two-day programme culminates with the criterium race featuring 28 top international riders (Marc Cavendish, Tadej Pogacar, Peter Sagan ...) from 7 of the worlds best professional cycling teams (UAE Emirates, Cofidis, Bahrain Victorious ...)

programme.title: Ötztaler Radmarathon 2023
programme.desc: The Ötztaler myth. Every year, around 4,000 racing cyclists have a dream: to finish the most demanding cycling marathon in the Alps. The circuit leads on 227 kilometers from Sölden over 4 alpine passes (Kühtaisattel, Brenner-, Jaufenpass and Timmelsjoch) to South Tyrol and back again. The participants master an unbelievable 5,500 meters of altitude, the fastest among them reaching the finish line in a record time of just over seven hours.Le mythe de lÖtztal. Chaque année, environ 4 000 coureurs cyclistes ont un rêve : terminer le marathon cycliste le plus exigeant des Alpes. Le circuit mène sur 227 kilomètres de Sölden par 4 cols alpins (Kühtaisattel, Brenner-, Jaufenpass et Timmelsjoch) au Tyrol du Sud et retour. Les participants maîtrisent un dénivelé incroyable de 5 500 mètres, les plus rapides dentre eux atteignant la ligne darrivée en un temps record dun peu plus de sept heures.

programme.title: Copa Kitley Qatar Airways GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2023
programme.desc: The Qatar Airways GKA Kite World Tour hits Rio de Janeiro in Brazil in 2023 for a Kite-Surf world cup event! The second stop of wave tour to debut in Rio de Janeiro with top athletes slated to battle for glory in renowned break. The tour leaders stamped their claim on the crown in the pure wave surfing contest in the legendary break of Cape Verde’s Ponta Preta. But the swell and wind in Saquarema can vary, with the effect that the contest may feature a mix of pure wave kite-surfing and strapless surfboard tricks, depending on the conditions. Thirty-five of the world’s best kite-surfing athletes—25 men and 10 women—from 14 nations around the globe are slated to battle for the crown in Saquarema. The spot on Saquarema’s Itauna Beach, a World Surf League stop last year, has a 12-day competition window to allow for the best possible conditions.

programme.title: Hugo & Max - The Grand Slam
programme.desc: During the 2022 season of ÖTILLÖ Swimrun the French-Swedish duo Hugo Tormento and Max Andersson set out on the quest to not only win ÖTILLÖ The Swimrun World Championship but to win every single race in the whole World Series. Seven in total.

programme.title: Lords Of Tram GKA Big-Air Kite World Cup France 2023
programme.desc: The Qatar Airways GKA Kite World Tour is excited to hit Barcares, France for the first Big Air event of the 2023 season. An event with previous history, the GKA is proud to add this location to the map. This event is 100 dedicated to the twin-tip Big Air discipline for both Men and Women. With a month waiting period, the competition takes place during the strongest day of Tramontana.

programme.title: All The Way (Eng)
programme.desc: From award-winning documentary filmmaker Carl Eneroth at Sthlm Social Innovation Lab comes "All the Way". A heart-pounding, intimate and mind expanding portrait of Swimrun team Pontus Lindberg and George Bjälkemo, as they prepare for their ultimate challenge… winning the 75 km ÖtillÖ Swimrun World Championships in the Stockholm archipelago… in trail shoes and a wetsuit.

programme.title: GKA Kite World Tour 2023 - Dakhla
programme.desc: The Qatar Airways GKA Kite World Tour Kite-Surf riders line-up at one of the kitesurfing world’s most contestable wave riding venues at West Point in Morocco – a host country that has been an ever-present on the world tour calendar for over 15 years.

programme.title: Freestyle Pro Tour 2023
programme.desc: The 2023 EFPT in Geneva kicks off on October 4th to show big tow-in and Foilstyle action. It marks the conclusion of the European Foilstyle and Tow-In Championship battles on the beautiful backdrop of the Swiss city of Geneva. Hosted by the Tropical Corner, this event is an incredible showcase of Freestyle Windsurfing ingenuity.

programme.title: GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2022 - Brazil
programme.desc: The fifth and last event of the season of the GWA Wingfoil World Tour takes place in Taiba in the state of Ceara in Brazil. Both the surf freestyle and surf slalom disciplines are held. Only Paula Novotna has already been confirmed as the womens surf freestyle world champion, all other titles will be awarded in Brazil. The events of the whole year make the desire for the last tour stop in 2022.

programme.title: Kite Masters 2022 - Episode 6
programme.desc: Winter is here and it is time to step off the water to enjoy kite action in a different way! Snowkiting is a sustainable sport practiced by people of almost any age, bringing them close to nature and its beauty without leaving a trace. Since this is our last episode of the year, let’s look back on all the unforgettable moments of this season! We experienced some amazing events such as the KiteFoil World Series! As we approach 2024, when kiteboarding will be officially introduced in the Olympic Games schedule, the level of performances is getting better and the number of participants is increasing!

programme.title: Visit Qatar GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup 2023
programme.desc: The first event of the new season is held at the Fuwairit Kite Beach Resort in Qatar opening the series with the Visit Qatar GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup.2023 Freestyle-Kite competition format:Among some smaller technical adaptations to trick family structures that aim to increase competitive excitement, essentially the Freestyle-Kite competition format will still see the four highest scoring tricks counting to a rider’s heat score from a total allowance of seven trick attempts.For 2023 Freestyle-kite fleets sizes remain the same as in the year before; limited to 28 or 14 competitors (men usually have 28 and women usually have 14). The fleet numbers for each event are realised as follows:28 riders: Top 22 ranked riders from previous season plus 6 different wildcards.14 riders: Top 11 ranked riders from previous season plus 3 different wildcards.

programme.title: Aliquam The Film
programme.desc: Aliquam is about passion for scuba diving. Several divers show us their personal in depth experience and how scuba diving became addictive. Scuba diving can give more meaning to life and allows you to switch off from day to day worries. This is the most motivating scuba diving film ever! Don’t believe it? Watch it.

programme.title: Kite Masters 2023 Episode 3
programme.desc: In this episode, the WingFoil Racing World Cup takes this enthralling sport to the global stage, reaching every corner of the world. The picturesque valley of Engadin in Switzerland is no exception to this. Over the years, Engadin has captivated water sports enthusiasts, offering an ideal setting to indulge in a diverse range of disciplines and exhilarating races. At the heart of this excitement lies Lake Silvaplana, the focal point for these thrilling activities. In the present year, the ENSIS EngadinWing by Dakine took center stage, setting the perfect arena for a Wingfoil Racing World Cup stop.

programme.title: The First Second - Armel Le Cléac'h E
programme.desc: Armel Le Cléach creates his victories thanks to a strong relationship with the whole team of which he is the extension ... But for this navigator engaged in a daunting battle with the ocean on a giant 32-meter trimaran, each course towards a new start is a new battle with the unknown, with his own will and with his primary adversary: himself.

programme.title: The First Second - Samantha Davies
programme.desc: Samantha Davies sees the ocean as a pleasure, obvious. In symbiosis with her boat, she leads a violent struggle with the harsh conditions and "loves it" in an almost inexplicable way! She knows and enjoys her luck, which she shares with Initiatives Cœur. She also measures it to that of her grandfather, a war submariner…. At the start of a race like the Vendée Globe, it is an adventurer who sets off.

programme.title: ÖTILLÖ Swimrun Engadin 2023
programme.desc: Slightly overcast but warm conditions made for an ideal race day in the beautiful Engadin valley. 450 athletes from 37 nations participated in the three race distances World Series, Sprint and Experience. 70 teams and 45 solo athletes competed in the World Series race, which covered a total distance of 43.4 km up and down the Upper Engadin with start and finish in Silvaplana. The racers had to master 37.5 km of partly very technical trail running and 5.9 km of swimming across 9 swim sections in Lake Silvaplana, Lake Champfèr and Lake Sils.Des conditions légèrement couvertes mais chaudes ont fait une journée de course idéale dans la belle vallée de lEngadine. 450 athlètes de 37 nations ont participé aux trois distances de course World Series, Sprint et Experience. 70 équipes et 45 athlètes en solo ont participé à la course des World Series, qui a parcouru une distance totale de 43,4 km dans la Haute-Engadine avec départ et arrivée à Silvaplana. Les coureurs devaient maîtriser 37,5 km de trail en partie très technique et 5,9 km de natation sur 9 sections de natation dans le lac de Silvaplana, le lac de Champfèr et le lac de Sils.

programme.title: Open Faces 2024
programme.desc: The most important Freeride World Tour Qualifier Series in Europe celebrated the start of the 10th season with the 2* FWT Qualifier competition. In challenging conditions the riders show their skills and offer top-class performances on the Quellspitze in Kappl/Paznaun.

programme.title: Pierra Menta 2024 #3
programme.desc: La Pierra Menta est devenue au fil des 37 éditions, la compétition de ski-alpinisme de référence, un passage obligé pour l’élite de la discipline. Elle rassemble tous les ans plus de 200 cordées de 2 skieurs. Tour de force au sommet du grand mont! les équipes masculines et féminines françaises confortent leur première place au classement général de la Pierra Menta au cœur dune troisième étape clé pour la victoire finale

programme.title: Open Faces 2024 Montafon
programme.desc: The Freeride Contest in Montafon (AUT) offers even more of the worlds best freeriders who will be at the start of the 4* contest. The terrain surrounding "little Heimspitze" in the Silvretta-Montafon region will be the venue for this years Open Faces Freeride Contest in Vorarlberg. This 4* FWT qualifier offers riders 2500 point and a rich prize money for a victory.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2023 Rd3 Kicking Horse Golden BC, Canada
programme.desc: The Freeride World Tour continues in Canada at Kicking Horse Golden BC, (CAN). Known for its champagne powder and long, steep runs, it’s no wonder Kicking Horse attracts riders from all over the globe. The competition takes place on the ever-impressive Ozone Face, offering riders 324 meters of vertical drop and a varied freeride playground of steep terrain, cornices, transfers, and big cliffs. This provides something to suit the different styles of the athletes, who scope out their lines and aim for what could earn a podium finish. In the back of their minds is the cut, which means for many, this would be their last FWT event of the season, and so they have nothing to lose to stay on tour and earn their place in the FWT Finals.

programme.title: Swiss Epic 2023
programme.desc: Teams of two compete in Switzerland’s pictures Graubünden region for the overall victory and important UCI mountain bike points at the Swiss Epic. With more than 350km and almost 12,000 meters of altitude, everything is demanded from the best mountain bikers. The route of the SPAR Swiss Epic 2023 leads over the breathtaking trails of Graubünden and crosses the Alps from Lenzerheide to St. Moritz before the event reaches its traditional conclusion in the town of Davos.

programme.title: Lekkarod 2022 (V. Int)
programme.desc: It is an exceptional line-up of mushers that has an appointment for this seventh edition of the Lekkarod. Coming from France, Germany, Switzerland, Spain and Alaska, 30 teams and 13 participants in the ski-joëring category took part in a total of 9 stages. From Chamrousse(Isère) to Bessans (Savoie) via Val DArly, the Lekkarod is an event counting for the IFSS World Cup (International Federation of Sleddog Sports).

programme.title: La Grande Odyssée 2022
programme.desc: La Grande Odyssée Savoie Mont Blanc est, depuis sa première édition en janvier 2005, l’événement annuel du chien de traîneau en Europe. C’est la course à étapes la plus exigeante dans un décor alpin unique au monde. Découvrez un plateau sportif d’exception avec 68 mushers et leurs 600 chiens-athlètes venant de grandes nations du mushing européen (France, Suède, Suisse, Espagne, Allemagne, Italie et Pologne). Ce sont plus de 50 000 spectateurs qui vivent chaque année une expérience unique, au coeur de 20 stations, villes et villages, de Savoie Mont Blanc en habits de fête pour l’occasion, en assistant à La Grande Odyssée Savoie Mont Blanc.La Grande Odyssee Savoie Mont Blanc is since it’s first edition in January 2005, the annual event of the dog sled race in Europe. It is the most demanding stage race in a unique alpine setting in the world. Each year it brings together more than 60 mushers and their 600 dogs, from all over Europe, in the stunning landscapes of Savoie Mont Blanc. It is more than 50 000 spectators who live every year a unique experience, in 20 stations decorated for the occasion, by attending La Grande Odyssee Savoie Mont Blanc.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2023 Ep4 Fieberbrunn, Austria
programme.desc: The Freeride World Tour 2023 has its fourth stop in Fieberbrunn, Austria - as always with the best freeriders from all over the world! The first part of the FWT finals takes place in Fieberbrunn, where the athletes have to conquer the imposing Wildseeloder. This mountain is a real test of endurance even for the most experienced pros, and the athletes will certainly have to give it all.

programme.title: World Rookie Freeski Finals 2024
programme.desc: The World Rookie Tour is excited that the Freeski Finals are held in the magnificent Ursus Snowpark at Madonna di Campiglio. This event shows the world’s most talented young freeski athletes as they compete in one of the most celebrated snowparks in Europe.This exclusive opportunity brings the excitement and competitive spirit of one of the most anticipated events in youth action sports directly to athletes, fans and viewers. Fans from across the globe have the opportunity to witness the future of freeskiing unfold in real-time.

programme.title: Nightmare Climbs - San Pantaleon (Eng)
programme.desc: Nightmare Climbs is in Valle DAosta to climb the last of four mythical climbs: in this episode, Patrick Martini and his special guests take us to the discovery of Colle San Pantaleon

programme.title: World Rookie Freeski Finals 2023
programme.desc: The 2023 World Rookie Finals Freeski in Madonna di Campiglio, Italy, is where the world’s best young skiers are ready to compete in order to take the titles of World Rookie and Grom Freeski Champions.

programme.title: Julbo White Session Zermatt & Chamonix
programme.desc: The unique story of two skiing legends (Sam Anthamatten and Vivian Bruchez) who invite a passionate amateur, Philip Criveli, to climb and ride the north face of the Breithorn (in Zermatt) as well as the Passerelle and Aiguillettes couloirs (in Chamonix).

programme.title: Laax Open 2024
programme.desc: The LAAX OPEN is Europes most important snowboard event: Since 2005, the January OPEN event in LAAX, Switzerland, has been a living freestyle lifestyle, melding contest with culture. Since 2017, it has been part of the FIS Snowboard World Cup circuit and is considered by numerous riders and teams there as the top favourite event. Performances in slopestyle and superpipe are all set to take the centre stage during the FIS Snowboard & Freeski World Cup. Women, men, on snowboards and freeskis will be soaring high and hurrahing the finest freestyle action.

programme.title: Skiing China, Exploring Altai Mountains
programme.desc: A quartet of champion skiers and snowboarders from Australia and the USA visit the unexplored Altai Frontier in China, now believed to be the place where skiing first developed, more than 10,000 years ago. They encounter the ancient culture of the region and explore the spectacular local slopes, using their own hi-tech equipment as well as the traditional skis manufactured by local craftsmen using age-old practices. The four visitors, Scott Kneller, Jari Hiatt, Halina Boyd and Harry Kearney, all of whom have world-beating careers in snowboarding, skiing and ski mountaineering, discover new challenges and new frontiers in China’s remote north-western province.

programme.title: La Grande Odyssée 2023 - Best of
programme.desc: The Grande Odyssée VVF, carrying the fundamental values ​​of those who love the mountains, has been since its first edition in January 2005, an essential event for dog sledding in Europe. For the first time in 19 years, the Grande Odyssée VVF will cover, in addition to Savoie and Haute Savoie, the department of Isère. The 19th edition will be held from January 7 to 19, 2023, with the presence of 66 mushers and their 600 top-level athletic dogs from all over Europe. They will set off for 13 days of racing, 400 km, 12,000 m of elevation gain, 11 stages, and will cross around 20 ski resorts.

programme.title: The First Second - Sam Anthamatten I
programme.desc: A specialist in high mountains, Sam is a committed freerider, but behind his instinct to ski, there is a guide: it is his job, his culture. At each line, an internal struggle begins between security and risk-taking ... The balance is difficult, with great freedom involved. Through his practice, he lives and perpetuates a mythical image, that of the Zermatt guide.

programme.title: The First Second - Sam Anthamatten
programme.desc: A specialist in high mountains, Sam is a committed freerider, but behind his instinct to ski, there is a guide: it is his job, his culture. At each line, an internal struggle begins between security and risk-taking ... The balance is difficult, with great freedom involved. Through his practice, he lives and perpetuates a mythical image, that of the Zermatt guide.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2023 Rd2 Ordino Arcalis Andorra
programme.desc: The Freeride World Tour 2023 has its second stop in Ordino Arcalís Pro, Andorra - as always with the best freeriders from around the world! Thus, the FWT returns to the freeride Mecca of the Pyrenees. This venue has become a staple of the tour, and for good reason. The playful terrain offers opportunities for explosive action and creative freeride lines.The judging criteria at the Freeride World Tour are: Difficulty of Line, Control, Fluidity, Jumps & Technique

programme.title: Nightmare Climbs - Jafferau (Eng)
programme.desc: Patrick Martini and his special guests are ready to climb a new, very tough peak: it is the ascent of Jafferau, in Bardonecchia, where Chris Froome won a legendary Pink Jersey in 2018.

programme.title: Nine Mountains
programme.desc: The journey of two cyclists (Leo Russell & George Stagg) on a mission to climb the 9 most challenging and notorious mountains in Europe. From Austria To Spain, Nine Mountains is an adventure of brutality and beauty exploring the limits of the mind and body. The boys cycled over 3,200km from blistering snowstorms to scorching deserts whilst ascending the equivalent of eight times the height of Everest. The film follows a never been done route with the aim to raise £100,000 towards mens mental health charity James Place, an organisation set up to help men in suicidal crisis.

programme.title: Backcountry skiing at Mcgillivray Lodge (Eng)
programme.desc: In March of 2021, Jeff and a group of friends took a helicopter from Pemberton, which is about 2 hours north of Vancouver, to an area called Whitecap Alpine to stay in the backcountry at McGillivray Pass Lodge for 4 nights and experience 4 great days of backcountry skiing.

programme.title: Pierra Menta 2024 #4
programme.desc: La Pierra Menta est devenue au fil des 37 éditions, la compétition de ski-alpinisme de référence, un passage obligé pour l’élite de la discipline. Elle rassemble tous les ans plus de 200 cordées de 2 skieurs. Victoire de Axelle Gachet-Mollaret & Emily Harrop ainsi que de Xavier Gachet & William Bonmardion la France sur le toit du monde du ski alpinisme avec ce doublé masculin/féminin, une grande première sur la Pierra Menta

programme.title: Freeski World Rookie Fest Innsbruck 2024
programme.desc: Once again Nordkette Skyline Park hosts the next generation of Freeski to showcase the future of the sport. Riders hit the Slopestyle course above Innsbruck to determine who will get tickets for this year’s World Rookie Freeski Finals later on this season.

programme.title: Highest Peak on Vancouver's North Shore - BRUNSWICK MOUNTAIN (Eng)
programme.desc: We summit Brunswick Mountain, the highest peak on Vancouvers North Shore, followed by Mt. Harvey right next to it. This video was filmed on the traditional, ancestral and unceded territory of the Coast Salish Peoples - Sḵwx̱wú7mesh (Squamish), Tsleil-Waututh & Musqueam First Nations.

programme.title: World Rookie Snowboard Finals 2023
programme.desc: The 2023 World Rookie Finals are took place in Zell am See-Kaprun (Austria), where the world’s best young snowboarders competed in order to take the titles of World Rookie and Grom Snowboard Champions.

programme.title: Golden Trail Series - Chasing Dreams Season 2022 - Episode 7 Strategic Decision (Eng)
programme.desc: The rankings are very tight during this 5-day stage race in Madeira, the top spots are almost secured, but to get a spot inside the top ten is the real challenge. Decision- making will be key throughout this final. This year’s rookie, Sophia Laukli, will have to make tough decisions to defend her position at the end of this season.

programme.title: Golden Trail World Series 2023 - Dolomyths Run (Eng)
programme.desc: After the first two exceptional legs, the Golden Trail World Series heads to Canazei, Italy and the thrilling DoloMyths Run. For its 25th anniversary the Italian classic is the 3rd leg of the GTWS 2023. Whos gonna survive to the Couloir of Hell? The race is the most technical one of the GTWS so here we will see all the runners that are specialists in technicall terrain and downhills. It is the last chance for them to score big points before the final.

programme.title: Golden Trail World Series 2022 - Zegama (Eng)
programme.desc: "Zegama is Zegama” The Basque Fever. Only a few lucky runners have the opportunity to run through the Basque Country’s highest peaks and fall under the spectators’ charms who cheer them on at every step. A town with just over 1,500 inhabitants is transformed to become the trail running epicenter for a unique weekend.

programme.title: Maxi Race 2023
programme.desc: Le tOur du lac, (la MaXi Race 88 km / 5000 m D+), course reine du week-end, a livré un scénario haletant avec une course indécise jusqu’au bout. Au départ, à 2 h 50 du matin, ils étaient 1752 coureurs dont 158 femmes.

programme.title: Malaysia Mountain Trail Festival 2022
programme.desc: Trail running can take you to the most beautiful places all over the world. For those who want to combine their passion trail running with travel, then The North Face Malaysia Mountain Trail Festival is the event for you! In November 2022, Malaysia and specifically Taiping set the stage for the fifth edition of this Trail Festival. Located in Northwest Malaysia, the capital of the State of Perak, Taiping was recently ranked in the Top 3 most sustainable cities in the world. It’s also synonymous with MMTF as each year hundreds of ambitious runners, offering magnificent forests, jungles and well-designed, challenging routes.

programme.title: Malaysia Mountain Trail Festival 2022
programme.desc: Trail running can take you to the most beautiful places all over the world. For those who want to combine their passion trail running with travel, then The North Face Malaysia Mountain Trail Festival is the event for you! In November 2022, Malaysia and specifically Taiping set the stage for the fifth edition of this Trail Festival. Located in Northwest Malaysia, the capital of the State of Perak, Taiping was recently ranked in the Top 3 most sustainable cities in the world. It’s also synonymous with MMTF as each year hundreds of ambitious runners, offering magnificent forests, jungles and well-designed, challenging routes.

programme.title: Racing Georgia - Ep 7 (Eng)
programme.desc: Athletes are on the final stage of a 7-day stage race in the country of Georgia with Racing the Planet as they take their final steps to the cave city of Varzdia after running 250 km while carrying all of their food and supplies for the week on their backs.

programme.title: Golden Trail Series - Chasing Dreams Season 2022 - Episode 5 A thirst for victory (Eng)
programme.desc: Follow the GTWS family as they travel together on a dream trip through the U.S. while they stop to race the Pikes Peak Ascent in Colorado and the Flagstaff Sky Peaks in Arizona. Rémi Bonnet, the uphill running specialist, will attempt to break the Manitou Incline record, while some last-minute newcomers might be shaking up the rankings. Take a deep breath and watch the world’s top runners racing at high-altitude.

programme.title: The Outdoor Sports Show 2023 - Episode 7
programme.desc: This episode begins with the Algarve Bike Challenge, Portugals most popular MTB stage race. Shifting our focus to Austria, we delve into the thrilling action of the Alpentour Trophy 2023, a multi-day mountain biking race. From Austria, we venture towards the vibrant capital of Spain, Madrid for a quick preview of the second edition of the Madrid 7 Picos cycling race which will take place in September, in the picturesque Sierra de Madrid. Continuing our mountainous exploration, we transition to the prestigious Golden Trail Series for the 2023 Zegama Aizkorri race.

programme.title: Ungrounded Episode 1 - Caroline Gleich
programme.desc: Caroline Gleich, a world class ski mountaineer, summited Mt. Everest last spring as part of her #ClimbForEquality campaign to raise awareness for gender equality. In Episode 1, Gleich overcomes her own struggle after tearing her ACL to rise to the top for all women. (English version with French, Italian, German and Spanish subtitles available)

programme.title: Adamello Ultra Trail 2023 - 170 km
programme.desc: The Adamello Ultra-Trail® is a trail running race of 170 km in length and about 11,500 m of elevation gain, to be covered in semi-self-sufficiency, organized by the ASD Adamello Ultra-Trail in collaboration with the Union of the Upper Camonica Valley Municipalities. The maximum time allowed to finish the race is 53 hours.

programme.title: Melaka International Marathon 2023
programme.desc: Located in the southern region of the Malay Peninsula, Melaka is a state in Malaysia with so much on offer both for its inhabitants and tourists. Melacca City, which is its capital, has also been listed as a UNESCO World Heritage Site since July 2008. For this first edition of the event, that would feature various distances along with the marathon one, the numbers of participants were great. A total 2766 runners representing 21 countries from all around the world descended in Melaka in order to get a taste of what this new concept is all about.

programme.title: Golden Trail Series - Chasing Dreams Season 2022 - Episode 3 Mental Fight (Eng)
programme.desc: Discover how trail running and nature can have healing powers. Join Australia’s Simone Brick on her journey pursuing personal growth. After quitting his job, Polish Bart Przedwojewski missed the first two races of the series. He will start his season in Norway where he will have to battle against the new downhill king, Manuel Merillas.

programme.title: Super League Triathlon London 2023
programme.desc: Welcome to round one of the Super League Triathlon Championship series 2023 in London, first of 4 rounds across three continents in eight weeks. The classic Enduro format was utilised, basically a non-stop burst of nine back-to-back triathlon disciplines without any breaks (or a 300m swim/4km bike/1.6km run repeated continuously three times in a row).

programme.title: Taylor Spivey: Riding the waves | Triathlon Racing Short
programme.desc: Follow Taylor Spiveys 2022 Super League Triathlon Championship series from beginning to end in our latest racing short episode, Taylor Spivey: Riding the waves.

programme.title: Salomon Community Run New Caledonia
programme.desc: Salomon Trail Runner Elite Vladimir Shatrov runs on one of the Worlds most challenging and brutal races. The New Caledonia Ultra Trail covers over 130km with 6500 meters of climbs across this stunning terrain. Follow the drama and hard lessons learned in this remote paradise.

programme.title: Expedition Canada Season 2 Ep 6 (Eng)
programme.desc: Nathalie Long is trying to string together another world class expedition race. Episode 6 : Teams Arrive. Kalamalka tries to swallow the team, Pete shows us how to ski Keefer Lake without skis, weather wins at the prologue, and the Canyon gets one last test.

programme.title: The Outdoor Sports Show 2023 - Episode 7
programme.desc: This episode begins with the Algarve Bike Challenge, Portugals most popular MTB stage race. Shifting our focus to Austria, we delve into the thrilling action of the Alpentour Trophy 2023, a multi-day mountain biking race. From Austria, we venture towards the vibrant capital of Spain, Madrid for a quick preview of the second edition of the Madrid 7 Picos cycling race which will take place in September, in the picturesque Sierra de Madrid. Continuing our mountainous exploration, we transition to the prestigious Golden Trail Series for the 2023 Zegama Aizkorri race.

programme.title: The Outdoor Sports Show 2023 - Episode 12
programme.desc: We start this episode with a journey to Brasov, Romania, where the renowned Brasov Running Festival unfolds. Continuing our exploration of the running world, we delve into the SuperHalfs event—a compelling series comprising six premier European half marathons hosted in Lisbon, Prague, Copenhagen, Cardiff, Valencia, and Berlin. Next, our travels take us to Greece, where the Olympus Marathons elevate the experience with trail running amidst breathtaking altitudes. Venturing into Croatia, we discover the Highlander Velebit—an invigorating non-competitive event set against the backdrop of pristine national parks. Shifting our focus to the depths, approximately 120 free divers gathered for the AIDA Freediving Outdoor World Championship in Limassol, Cyprus. Remaining in Europe, our journey takes us to Germany for a remarkable event held in September 2023—the Invictus Games. Conceived by Prince Harry, the Duke of Sussex, this initiative supports the recovery and rehabilitation of participating servicemen and women. The 2023 Games in Dusseldorf featured over 500 participants engaging in 208 competitions, resulting in the awarding of 624 medals.

programme.title: Road To One Water Race Ep7 - Body & Mind
programme.desc: One Water Race is an endurance race based on Running, Swimming and Orienteering. 7 mixed teams of 7 athletes have to cross the Stockholm-Sweden archipelago from North to South in a non-stop 250 km race with 200 km of running and 50 km of swimming. They have to completely handle their navigation including in the darkness. Road to One Water Race Ep7 shows the physical and mental pressure that racers have to cope with

programme.title: Backcountry skiing at Mcgillivray Lodge (Eng)
programme.desc: In March of 2021, Jeff and a group of friends took a helicopter from Pemberton, which is about 2 hours north of Vancouver, to an area called Whitecap Alpine to stay in the backcountry at McGillivray Pass Lodge for 4 nights and experience 4 great days of backcountry skiing.

programme.title: Marathon des Sables 2023 - The Film
programme.desc: This 37th edition of the Marathon Des Sables has been one of the most selective in the history of the MDS, the desert has given no gift to the 1085 competitors who came to face the elements. Extreme temperatures throughout the week saw 771 competitors complete the adventure. Everyone comes there for good reasons, to support a cause, to escape a too heavy daily life, to take up a challenge or quite simply to find answers to philosophical, existential questions, whatever; you never come back unscathed from this extraordinary adventure. But long before all that, 39 years ago now, a man set out alone to conquer the Moroccan desert to cross what was to become the territory of the future Marathon Des Sables.

programme.title: Expedition Canada Season 1 Ep 1 (Eng)
programme.desc: A dedicated team of adventure aficionados in the central and south Okanagan work against the clock to build the second edition of Expedition Canada, an adventure race which is part of the Adventure Race World Series.

programme.title: The Outdoor Sports Show 2023 - Episode 8
programme.desc: This episode begins amidst the bustling cycling event of the Tour of Qinghai Lake in China. Since its inception in 2002, this esteemed road bicycle racing stage race has magnetized elite cyclists from across the globe. We then get a presentation of a new triathlon series : TRITON. Then our odyssey carries us to Brazil for the World Trail Races mixing Trail Run and Mountain Bike Events. Our next destination unfurls in the scenic embrace of Spain for The Palma Marathon Mallorca. Journeying onward, we find ourselves in the captivating backdrop of Romania, mere kilometers away from the legendary Bran Castle, famously known as Draculas Castle for The Brasov Running Festival 10K. The spotlight then turns to the awe-inspiring feats of HYROX athletes and the World Championship held amidst the grandeur of Manchester, England, in the 2023 HYROX Season.

programme.title: Expedition Canada Season 2 Ep 3 (Eng)
programme.desc: Nathalie Long is trying to string together another world class expedition race. Episode 3 : Bear Country. Spinning up to Mount Baldy, chatting about checkpoints while a few bears try to climb a pole, Mike becomes incomprehensible, we meet a few more of the teams and Nat takes us to find a cabin that doesn’t exist.

programme.title: Georgia on my bike - Part 3 (Eng)
programme.desc: Michele continues his journey through Georgia. He must now cross the whole country from east to west to reach the Black Sea, the ultimate goal of his trip. He visits many historical sites such as the David Gareja Monastery, the troglodyte city of Vardzia or the castle of Akhaltsikhe. His journey takes place in the middle of impressive natural settings such as the colorful mountains or Lake Paravani.Michele continua il suo viaggio attraverso la Georgia. Ora deve attraversare lintero paese da est a ovest per raggiungere il Mar Nero, la meta finale del suo viaggio. Visita molti siti storici come il monastero di David Gareja, la città troglodita di Vardzia o il castello di Akhaltsikhe. Il suo viaggio si svolge in mezzo a suggestivi scenari naturali come le montagne colorate o il Lago Paravani.

programme.title: Expedition Antarctica of extreme sports woman Caro North
programme.desc: Iceclimbing, ski mountaineering and sailing the open water for days through the infamous Drake Passage: The 28 years old extreme sports woman Caro North made her way to the very South of our continent for a four weeks expedition – accompanied by an eight-member crew. Antarctica turned out to be a paradise for extreme sports: deserted landscapes and snow-capped mountains against a surreal backdrop of ice and sea were waiting to be discovered.

programme.title: Tour of Hellas 2023 Stage 3
programme.desc: The penultimate day’s starting point will be the Navarino Dunes area in Costa Navarino, located in Messinia, in one of the most unspoiled landscapes in the Mediterranean, heading towards the bay of Navarino and will pass through historical places such as Pylos, Methoni and Koroni. Completing a counterclockwise semi-circle in the Prefecture of Messinia, the athletes will finish in the main square of Kyparissia (with the magnificent Upper Town and the castle of Arcadia), probably in a mass sprint.

programme.title: L'Eroica 2022
programme.desc: LEroica draws its inspiration from classical cycling, from black and white images published on newspapers of the early 1900s to the times of the Bartali and Coppi duel, to more recent times when pedal cages and shifters on the down tube where still the main option on road racing bikes. LEroica chose as a convention 1987 as the year to draw the line between classic cycling and modern times. NOVA Eroica combines gravel, gran fondo and Eroica-style rest stops that encourage riders to Race, Ride and Relax! Open to gravel, road and cx bikes, NOVA celebrates the white roads of Tuscany by combining time trial segments with amazing transfer sections for the thrill of racing and an epic group ride experience.

programme.title: Nightmare Climbs - Gran San Bernardo (Eng)
programme.desc: We find Patrick Martini and three experienced cyclists in the Aosta Valley. The four friends make the difficult and long ascent of the Gran San Bernardo pass. The slope is steep but the landscapes are fantastic and we discover many interesting aspects of the region.

programme.title: Titan Desert Morocco 2018
programme.desc: A look back at the 2018 edition of the Garmin Titan Desert, a six-stage mountain bike race in the Moroccan desert. Orientation and endurance are two essential assets for a course that will make you discover the most incredible landscapes of Morocco over nearly 640 kilometers.

programme.title: Titan Desert Morocco 2020
programme.desc: A look back at the 2020 edition of the Titan Desert, a six-stage mountain bike race in the Moroccan desert. Orientation and endurance are two essential assets for a course that will make you discover the most incredible landscapes of Morocco over nearly 640 kilometers.

programme.title: Cape Epic 2023 (Eng)
programme.desc: The Absa Cape Epic is the world’s premier mountain bike stage race. The route changes every year, leading aspiring amateur and professional mountain bikers from around the world through 658 Untamed kilometres of unspoilt scenery and up 15775m of climbing. The Absa Cape Epic is classed as UCI Mountain Bike Marathon Series (SSR) by the Union Cycliste Internationale (UCI); this official UCI status makes it a highlight on the professional racers calendar. The Absa Cape Epic also attracts aspiring amateur riders wanting to test themselves against the best.

programme.title: The First Second - Jerome Clementz
programme.desc: Seeing Jérôme Clementzs eyes fixed on the track, we have already understood what dose of concentration, determination and pure strength he will unleash on the descent. Leaving, throughout his 20-year competitive career, little luck to his competitors, how does he oush the boundaries?

programme.title: Cape Epic 2022
programme.desc: The Absa Cape Epic is the world’s premier mountain bike stage race. The route changes every year, leading aspiring amateur and professional mountain bikers from around the world through 650 Untamed kilometres of unspoilt scenery and up 16 000m of climbing. The Absa Cape Epic is the most televised mountain bike race in the world and classed as UCI Mountain Bike Marathon Series (SSR) by the Union Cycliste Internationale (UCI); this official UCI status makes it a highlight on the professional racers calendar. The Absa Cape Epic also attracts aspiring amateur riders wanting to test themselves against the best.

programme.title: Muscat Classic 2024
programme.desc: The Muscat Classic is a cycling race which takes place as a prelude to the Tour Of Oman on a difficult 174 kilometer route between Al Mouj Muscat and Al Bustan with 6 climbs totaling 2,000 meters of D+.

programme.title: Tour of Hellas 2023 Stage 1
programme.desc: The race continues with the first stage which starts and ends in the city of Heraklion. It is the longest route (187.7 km) of this years Tour, an anti-clockwise circle within the regional unit of Heraklion. A very demanding stage for those fighting for the blue jersey will surely push the riders to their limits since it is the one with the highest altitude (2,561m).

programme.title: Nightmare Climbs - San Pantaleon (Eng)
programme.desc: Nightmare Climbs is in Valle DAosta to climb the last of four mythical climbs: in this episode, Patrick Martini and his special guests take us to the discovery of Colle San Pantaleon

programme.title: From The South Up - The Film
programme.desc: Brendon Tyree, a photographer and ex elite bicycle racer from Sheffield in the UK is turning one of those old dreams into reality : to ride on his bike the length of South America. His trip starts off at the bottom of the world in Chile’s extreme south, and then ride north through a constantly changing landscape of Glaciers, Deserts and Salt flats followed by the high Andean Mountains and the Amazon Rain Forest before finally finishing up on the Caribbean coast of Colombia.

programme.title: Santos Tour Down Under 2024 Women
programme.desc: The Santos Tour Down Under womens race happening in Adelaide-Australia is first on the UCI international cycling calendar. In 2024, the Santos Tour Down Under womens peloton race on a new course. The worlds best riders tackle Willunga Hill for the first time as they compete for the Ochre jersey across three stages.

programme.title: Tour Of Oman 2024 (Eng)
programme.desc: The 2024 Tour of Oman is a road cycling stage race rated as a category 2 Pro event on the 2024 UCI ProSeries calendar, and was the 13th edition of the Tour of Oman. Nine of the 18 UCI WorldTeams, four UCI ProTeams, three UCI Continental teams, and the Omani national team made up the 17 teams that participated in the race.

programme.title: Tour de France Prudential Singapore Criterium (Media Day)
programme.desc: The Tour de France Prudential Singapore Criterium race weekend includes races for both professionals and amateurs.
